data.event: The county was formed in 1842 from parts of Anson County and Mecklenburg County.

event.title: 1958, local NAACP Chapter President Robert F. Williams defended

data.event: In 1958, local NAACP Chapter President Robert F. Williams defended a nine-year-old African-American boy who had been kissed by a white girl in an incident known as the Kissing Case.
In 1961, Williams was accused of kidnapping an elderly white couple, when he sheltered them in his house during a very explosive situation of high racial tensions.
